name: h3
description: The Chandler NG07 Alien Maple Wood Bat is a top-tier choice for serious players, featuring a unique black and lime green colorway that stands out on the field. With a slight end-loaded swing feel and thin flare handle, this bat is designed for power hitters seeking an optimal hitting surface provided by its large barrel. The Turn Model NG07 offers a drop 3 length to weight ratio, enhancing swing precision and control. Engineered for pro-grade durability, it is ink dot certified and boasts a half cup for improved weight distribution. Exclusively available at Better Baseball, this bat showcases an eye-catching alien emblem and slime, along with cryptic handle design, making it a must-have for ballplayers. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 60 Days is included.
